Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2019 10:28PM Silv-509 wrote: I just started Doxorubicin liposome this morning and I will be sure to keep posting. So far so good although I know they say the side effects can kick in after 2-3 days. I had weekly Taxol for 19 treatments and tolerated it very well. It was time to change chemo due to mixed response mostly in the liver on my last P.E.T. scan 3/2019  of course it would be great to hear from others on Doxorubicin liposome. Thank you!
Posts.Title: How are people with liver mets doing? blondie1 JFL
